10000
10000 REM NO Q
10000
10010 GOTOV
10100
10100 REM MOVE AN OBJECT
10100
10120 A=P-15
10125 RETURN
10220 F=P-10
10225 RETURN
10300 J=P-6
10305 RETURN
10320 K=P-5
10325 RETURN

10360 M=P-3

10465 RETURN

11500 REM TAKE PROCESSOR
11500

11520 X=8830
11550 IFH>99GOTO4840
11560 GOSUB1660

11580 GOSUB1720
11585 P=1016

11615 P=2016
11620 GOSUB13810
11630 PR
11640 GOSUB13780
11660 GOTO5075

13250 GOSUB9310

13500 REM DESTROY AN OBJECT (D,M,T) 
13500 
13510 PR"YOU KILLED THE "; 
13520 RETURN 
13540 IFV/8*B<0B=B-16 
13600 D=13004

13740 REM LIST OBJECTS 
13740

13750 GOSUB13770 
13760 GOTO7270 
13770 X=-5 
13780 P=N+2 
13790 GOTO13820 
13810 IFP>NGOTO13770 
13815 X=0 
13820 IFA+15=PGOSUBX+12520
13830 IFF+10=PGOSUBX+12620 
13840 IFJ+6<>PGOTO13910
13850 IFP<>26016IFP<>29016GOTO13890 
13860 IFX=0IF(P/29000+1)*64*Q<0GOTO13890
13870 GOTO13910 
13890 GOSUBX+12700 
13910 IFK+5<>PGOTO13960 
13920 IFP<>29016GOTO13950 
13930 IFX=0IFQ*128<0GOTO13950 
13940 GOTO13960
13950 GOSUBX+12720 
13960 IFL+4=PGOSUBX+12740 
13970 IFR-2=PGOSUBX+12860
13980 IFS-3=PGOTOX+12880 
13990 RETURN
